channel.title: Npc help?!?!?!?!?
channel.description:
ok i changed my npc to say what i wanted to say i went on npchandler.java and changed it i saved and compile but when i log in the npc is not sayin what i wanted it to say. :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :confused: :confused:
$konvict akon1$ [br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2007, 11:34:20 PM[/size][hr]fuck need help@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

item.title: Npc help?!?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @_Revolation † Revolation †
item.description:
@_Revolation wrote:

Check the Npc ID, if there both correct.

Edit: Ok i took from my NPC handler, and this is what you should do, where it sais Npc Type == 550) Thats the NPC ID, thats the Npc, that is going to talk. Make sure that the NPC ID, is the same with the NPC you are wanting to talk.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 550) { if (misc.random2(15) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "All Your Pure Item needs!"; } }

I hope this Helped And dont Post twice :mad:, the Modify Button is there for a reason!

  • Revolation

Read full topic
